description: Time horizon of the optimization problem
Number of branches: when hyperarcs are used, this is the number of hyperarc branches and it is higher than NumberLines
Number of networks in the problem; if not provided it is taken as TimeHorizon
Number of pieces of the power flow function
List of buses of connection by unit
Efficiency of lines or hyperarc branches; functional only for HVDC lines (default 1.0)
Hyperarch ID of each branch: it is the line id corresponding to the branch being added
Marginal cost of the network flows
